Name: Observer's Notebook
Description: This book is the object that defines your commitment to the observers of the Tarantino Family. Fill it with every monster interaction and make sure to keep it with you at all times.

Name: Lockpick set
Description: Lockpick sets are perfect for cracking open the locks of doors and chests that may harbor amazing treasures or even mythical beings.

Name: Smoke bombs
Description: Every observer needs an easy way out. Smoke bombs are perfect for the cleanest get away from a monster altercation.
